attributes.action: Change the National Anthem to "I Vow to Thee, My Country"
attributes.additional_details: I believe that this change would better represent and celebrate the strengths and virtues of Great Britain as a whole, as opposed to just our monarch.
attributes.background: I would like Parliament to change the British National Anthem from "God Save the King" to "I Vow to Thee, My Country".

rejection.details:
The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here:

https://www.royal.uk/national-anthem
